prompt_base: raw photo, stern elderly japanese karate master, traditional gi, large scar tissue on chest, muscular weathered physique, stern expression, wise gaze
feature_prompt: deep wrinkles, weathered skin texture, rough scar details, heavy fabric texture, realistic hair strands, cinematic dramatic lighting, 8k uhd, sharp focus
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, sketch, 3d render, plastic, doll, smooth skin, young, clean, lowres, blurry, distorted anatomy
